Stephen helped turn our company around in less than six months with his expertise in the SEO world.  We've been taken advantage of in the past by many different companies with little to zero results and paid thousands and thousands of dollars with no return.  Stephen Gerlach has been a blessing in this arena. Stephen is honest, reliable, and does exactly what he says he's going to do.  We used Stephen to help in developing our small businesses.  We started with one business that was getting ready to be closed and he did an outstanding job of getting it back on it's feet saving many jobs here in the Valley.  He's officially our SEO and Marketing Consultant for all of our companies.   Some of the services he did to turn our business around was  SEO and online marketing, understanding and utilizing  Google analytics & webmaster tools, tweaking our current website design and content to best optimize results, and much more.  He's the go to guy in the SEO world!

summary: Are you looking to grow your business and be found on the top of Google? If you are shoot me a message and let's have a quick chat, you will not be disappointed.★★★★★ I am a results driven SEO that puts his clients first and delivers fantastic results.  ★★★★★Every day small businesses such as yours call me and I help them achieve their online goals quickly as possible in an Affordable way.Call me today to see how I can help YOU and Your business as I have for 100's of others!  My Areas of Expertise:• Small Business Development• On-Page & Technical SEO• Link Acquisition & Authority Link Building• Keyword & Competition Analysis• Local Search Marketing • Google Analytics & Webmaster Tools • Responsive Website Design and Development• Content Conversion Optimization• Lead Generation• SEO & Online Marketing Consultant★ Call me at (855) 534-5700 or visit us on the web at www.SeoDude.Net today! ★
